opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs to be equally divided.
Mr. CMef Justice Jones took no part in the consideration or decision of this appeal.

casebody.head_matter:
Gerwell, Appellant, v. Blockus.
Argued November 17, 1972.
Before Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Joseph J. Musto, with him Bedford, Waller, Griffith, Darling and Mitchell, for appellant.
John E. O’Connor, with Mm Flanagan, Doran, Biscontini & Shaffer, for appellees.
January 19, 1973:
